Posts.Content: Hi to all  I was diagnosed 2nd March with stage 1 grade 2 invasive ductal.  Oestrogen + her 2 _ No lymph or vascular involvement therefore my consultant sent off for Onco dx test mine came back low at 16 therefore chemotherapy not offered . Starting radiotherapy soon for 3 weeks followed by 1 weeks boost. Never knew how much was involved!! Such a learning game !!
Posts.Title: I e been asked today what my Oncotype DX Test result was by a friend...
